description: The greatest game of all time.

1.5.4.description:
This is the official release of the Clique AP World, based on 1.5.4 of the [Clique](https://clique.pharware.com) browser game.

A template YAML for Clique is also included as `Clique.yaml`.

## Installation

To install, drag the `clique.apworld` file into your Archipelago `custom_worlds` folder or click "Install APWorld" in the Archipelago Launcher and select `clique.apworld`.

Requires [Archipelago](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases/latest) to generate since 0.6.2 of Archipelago.

## Changelog

### Client Changes

- Game now reports as supporting AP version 0.5.0 when connecting to an Archipelago server.
  - Repository has not be updated with this (yet), but it is live on the site.

### APWorld Changes

- Added a new option: `force_progression` which forces a progression item on "The Button".
  - Default is `true` and works like the previous version included in Archipelago (<= 0.6.1).
- Updated the slot data to include `hard_mode` setting and `world_version`.
- Updated "The Button" to allow "Button Activation" items to be placed.
- Refactored a lot of code for simplicity.
- Renamed "The Big Red Button" to "The Button".
- Renamed "The Item on the Desk" to "The Free Item".
- Removed setup documentation (will be rewritten on the front-end in the Clique v2 update).
- Removed event items/locations from spoiler.
  - Never made sense for a game this simple anyway.
1.5.4.title: Clique v1.5.4 - The Independence Update
